canonical.description: Set to `true` if the microblock corresponds to the canonical chain tip.

microblock_canonical.description: Set to `true` if the microblock was not orphaned in a following anchor block. Defaults to `true` if the following anchor block has not yet been created.

microblock_hash.description: The SHA512/256 hash of this microblock.

microblock_sequence.description: A hint to describe how to order a set of microblocks. Starts at 0.

microblock_parent_hash.description: The SHA512/256 hash of the previous signed microblock in this stream.

block_height.description: The anchor block height that confirmed this microblock.

parent_block_height.description: The height of the anchor block that preceded this microblock.

parent_block_hash.description: The hash of the anchor block that preceded this microblock.

parent_burn_block_hash.description: The hash of the Bitcoin block that preceded this microblock.

parent_burn_block_time.description: The block timestamp of the Bitcoin block that preceded this microblock.

parent_burn_block_time_iso.description: The ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) formatted block time of the bitcoin block that preceded this microblock.

parent_burn_block_height.description: The height of the Bitcoin block that preceded this microblock.

block_hash.description: The hash of the anchor block that confirmed this microblock. This wil be empty for unanchored microblocks

txs.description: List of transactions included in the microblock
